a.span: Sign up here for our Meal Program during the school closure

p.style: line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

span.style: color: rgb(255, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

p.span: Schools will be closed through May 15, 2020. Governor Cuomo has extended the closure of schools through May 15, 2020. Stay well.

div.div:
While the Adirondack Central School District does not have a confirmed case of COVID-19, we are aware of concerns in the community about the spread of this virus.
Regents Exam Update (NYSED - April 7th)
Superintendent's Update Letter (April 3rd)
Child Care Survey for Parents - ​Child care for essential employees
For more information on Adirondack Central School's response to COVID-19, please visit our COVID-19 Community Information page found -Here-
